title: The Time of your life: the fundamentals of time management
brief_description: This film, which is based on Alan Lakein’s book “How to get control of your time and your life”, examines the everyday problems of time management. It looks in particular at the problems of disorganisation, interruptions, paperwork and procrastination, and offers workable solutions to these.
